00032 {

00036         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00037         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00040 void DATFileUpdaterTest::GlobalGridTest()
00041 {
00042         std::string filename = "DAT_GlobalGrid";
00043         WriteGlobalGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00044         u_int32_t status1;
00045         FRegion region1;
00046         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00047         ReadGlobalGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00048         DATData data(filename);
00049         AddGlobalGridData(data, 1.0);
00050         AddParameters(data);
00051         u_int32_t status2 = data.GetGlobalGridStatus();
00052         FRegion region2 = data.GetGlobalGrid();
00053         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00054         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00055         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00057         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00058 }

00102 void DATFileUpdaterTest::SubGridTest()
00103 {
00104         std::string filename = "DAT_SubGrid";
00105         WriteSubGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00106         Uint32Vector status1;
00107         FRegionVector region1;
00108         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00109         ReadSubGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00110         DATData data(filename);
00111         AddSubGridData(data, 1.0);
00112         AddParameters(data);
00113         Uint32Vector status2;
00114         FRegionVector region2;
00115         GetSubGridData(data, region2, status2);
00116         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00117         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00118         if (region1 == region2)
00119                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00121         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00122 }

00146 void DATFileUpdaterTest::SubGridIIITest()
00147 {
00148         std::string filename = "DAT_SubGrid_III";
00149         WriteSubGridDatFile(filename, 1.0);
00150         DATData data(filename);
00151         AddSubGridData(data, 7.0);
00152         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00153         updater.Update();
00154         Uint32Vector status1;
00155         FRegionVector region1;
00156         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params1;
00157         ReadSubGridData(filename, region1, status1, params1);
00158         DATData data2(filename);
00159         AddSubGridData(data2, 7.0);
00160         AddParameters(data);
00161         Uint32Vector status2;
00162         FRegionVector region2;
00163         GetSubGridData(data2, region2, status2);
00164         ParameterNameValueTypeVector params2;
00165         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params2);
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(region1 == region2);
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(status1 == status2);
00168         CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(params1, params2);
00169 }

00171 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteDatFile(const std::string& filename)
00172 {
00173         DATData data(filename);
00174         data.SetPixelCount(10);
00175         data.SetStatsCount(10);
00176         data.SetPixelSize(.7F);
00177         data.SetScannerID(L"main");
00178         data.SetScannerType(L"M10");
00179         data.SetArrayType(L"Hg-small");
00180         data.SetRows(4);
00181         data.SetCols(5);
00182         DATFileWriter* writer = new DATFileWriter(data);
00183         u_int16_t s[] = { 16, 22, 14, 39, 26, 36 };
00184         Uint16Vector stats;
00185         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00186         {
00187                 stats.push_back(s[i]);
00188         }
00189         writer->WriteStats(stats);
00190 
00191         u_int16_t p[] = { 36, 3, 7, 8, 11, 2 };
00192         Uint16Vector pixels;
00193         for(int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
00194         {
00195                 pixels.push_back(p[i]);
00196         }
00197         writer->WritePixels(pixels);
00198         delete writer;
00199 }

00201 bool DATFileUpdaterTest::IsEqual(const FRegionVector& r1, const FRegionVector& r2)
00202 {
00203         if(r1.size() == r2.size())
00204         {
00205                 size_t sz = r1.size();
00206                 for(size_t i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00207                 {
00208                         if(r1[i] == r2[i]) continue;
00209                         return false;
00210                 }
00211                 return true;
00212         }
00213         return false;
00214 }

00216 void DATFileUpdaterTest::GetSubGridData(const DATData& data, FRegionVector& regions, Uint32Vector& status)
00217 {
00218         int32_t cnt = data.GetSubgridCnt();
00219         for(int i = 0; i < cnt; i++)
00220         {
00221                 FRegion region = data.GetSubgrid(i);
00222                 regions.push_back(region);
00223                 status.push_back(data.GetSubgridStatus(i));
00224         }
00225 }

00227 void DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadGlobalGridData(const std::string& filename, FRegion& region, u_int32_t& status, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& params)
00228 {
00229         DATFileReader reader;
00230         DATData data(filename);
00231         reader.Read(data);
00232         region = data.GetGlobalGrid();
00233         status = data.GetGlobalGridStatus();
00234         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00235 }

00237 void DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadSubGridData(const std::string& filename, FRegionVector& regions, Uint32Vector& status, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& params)
00238 {
00239         DATFileReader reader;
00240         DATData data(filename);
00241         reader.Read(data);
00242         GetSubGridData(data, regions, status);
00243         data.GetGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameters(params);
00244 }

00246 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteGlobalGridDatFile(const std::string& filename, float increment)
00247 {
00248         WriteDatFile(filename);
00249         DATData data(filename);
00250         AddGlobalGridData(data, increment);
00251         AddParameters(data);
00252         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00253         updater.Update();
00254 }

00256 void DATFileUpdaterTest::WriteSubGridDatFile(const std::string& filename, float increment)
00257 {
00258         WriteGlobalGridDatFile(filename, increment);
00259         DATData data(filename);
00260         AddSubGridData(data, increment);
00261         AddParameters(data);
00262         DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00263         updater.Update();
00264 }
00265 
00266 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddSubGridData(DATData& data, float increment)
00267 {
00268         for(int n = 0; n < 4; n++)
00269         {
00270                 FRegion region;
00271                 float ptVal = 0.0;
00272                 for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00273                 {
00274                         FPoint point;
00275                         point.x = ptVal;
00276                         ptVal += increment;
00277                         point.y = ptVal;
00278                         region.pts.push_back(point);
00279                 }
00280 
00281                 u_int32_t status = DATData::GridError | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00282                 if (n % 2 == 0)
00283                         status = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00284 
00285                 data.AddSubgrid(status, region);
00286         }
00287 }
00288 
00289 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddGlobalGridData(DATData& data, float increment)
00290 {
00291         FRegion region;
00292         float ptVal = 0.0;
00293         for(int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00294         {
00295                 FPoint point;
00296                 point.x = ptVal;
00297                 ptVal += increment;
00298                 point.y = ptVal;
00299                 region.pts.push_back(point);
00300         }
00301         u_int32_t status = DATData::GridOK | DATData::GridManualAdjust;
00302         data.SetGlobalGrid(status, region);
00303 }

00305 void DATFileUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdTest()
00306 {
00307         std::string filename = "DAT_FileIdTest";
00308         WriteDatFile(filename);
00309         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = ReadFileId(filename);
00310 
00311         DATData data(filename);
00312         AddGlobalGridData(data, 1.0);
00313         
00314         { // Need to force DATFileUpdater destructor between being able to read the file properly.
00315                 DATFileUpdater updater(data);
00316                 updater.Update();
00317         }
00318         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = ReadFileId(filename);
00319 
00320         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId != newFileId);
00321 }
00322 
00323 AffymetrixGuidType DATFileUpdaterTest::ReadFileId(const std::string& filename)
00324 {
00325         DATFileReader reader;
00326         DATData data(filename);
00327         reader.Read(data);
00328         
00329         return data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00330 }

00332 void DATFileUpdaterTest::AddParameters(DATData& data)
00333 {
00334         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00335         nvt.SetName(L"Santa Clara");
00336         nvt.SetValueUInt8(56);
00337         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00338 
00339         nvt.SetName(L"San Mateo");
00340         nvt.SetValueFloat(4.56f);
00341         data.AddGridAlignmentAlgorithmParameter(nvt);
00342 }
00343 
00344 void DATFileUpdaterTest::CompareParameterNameValueTypeVectors(ParameterNameValueTypeVector& left, ParameterNameValueTypeVector& right)
00345 {
00346         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left.size() == right.size());
00347 
00348         for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::size_type i = 0; i < left.size(); ++i)
00349         {
00350                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetName() == right[i].GetName());
00351                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetParameterType() == right[i].GetParameterType());
00352 
00353                 switch(left[i].GetParameterType())
00354                 {
00355                 case ParameterNameValueType::FloatType:
00356                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetValueFloat() == right[i].GetValueFloat());
00357                         break;
00358                 case ParameterNameValueType::UInt8Type:
00359                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(left[i].GetValueUInt8() == right[i].GetValueUInt8());
00360                         break;
00361     default:
00362                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00363       break;
00364                 }
00365         }
00366 }
